CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: abrdn Emerging Markets Equity Income Fund, Inc.

Address.label: Address
Address.value: C/O CREDIT SUISSE ASSET MGMT, LLC,ELEVEN MADISON AVENUE SUITE 200, NEW YORK, 10017, United Kingdom

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Fund seeks to provide both current income and longterm capital appreciation. The fund invests primarily in Chilean equity & debt securities. It is the policy of the Fund normally to invest at least 80% of total assets both in Chilean equity and debt securities, although under normal market conditions most investments will be in equity securities.
